column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I live in a city where there is never enough parking .
#id=2
#text=Because of this , I like to take the bus .
#id=3
#text=If you know what bus to take , you can get almost anywhere !
#id=4
#text=Today I needed to go to the grocery store to get ingredients for dinner .
#id=5
#text=Happily , there is a bus stop only a block from my apartment .
#id=6
#text=Before I left the house I made sure to check if I had my bus pass .
#id=7
#text=My pass allows me to ride the bus whenever I want !
#id=8
#text=If I did n't have it , I would have to pay $ 2.10 for the ride .
#id=9
#text=I waited at the bus stop for just a few minutes before a bus drove by .
#text=I did n't get on it , however , because it was the 90 bus .
#text=I know that I need to take the 87 or 88 to get to the grocery store .
#text=Finally an 87 bus stopped , and I got on , tapping my bus pass onto a special box near the door .
#text=The driver started driving down the street .
#text=We stopped a couple of times at Lexington Road and then Drove Street .
#text=Sometimes people got off the bus , and sometimes people got on .
#text=Next it was my stop : Broadway Street .
#text=I thanked the bus driver as I got off .
#text=It 's so much nicer to take the bus than walk all that way !
